name: PublishBuildArtifacts
description: Publish Build artifacts to the server or a file share

inputs.name: PathtoPublish
inputs.label: Path to Publish
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder or file path to publish.  Can be a fully qualified path or relative to repo root, wildcards are not supported. Use [variables](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988). Example: $(build.artifactstagingdirectory)

inputs.name: ArtifactName
inputs.label: Artifact Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the artifact to create.

inputs.name: ArtifactType
inputs.label: Artifact Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: The type of artifact to create.

inputs.name: TargetPath
inputs.label: Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The file share to which to copy the files
